attributes.action: Abolish the daily standing charges on Gas Electricity and Water.
attributes.additional_details: Daily standard charges cost in the region between £300 to £500 per year for Gas, Electricity and Water combined. These costs for the year taken off would help many couples, families and elderly.
attributes.background: For the Government to look into the cost of daily standing charges. Put pressure on the energy suppliers to cancel or abolish.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for utility providers.

You can find out more about standing charges for energy here: https://www.energyhelpline.com/help/what-are-unit-rates-and-standing-charges

And you can find out more about standing charges for water here: https://www.ofwat.gov.uk/households/your-water-bill/metering/
